posts.message:
If you don't know about it, you should.
---------------------------------------------
What is Scrum?
--
Scrum is a framework for developing and sustaining complex products. This Guide contains the 
definition of Scrum. This definition consists of Scrum’s roles, events, artifacts, and the rules that 
bind them together. 
Ken Schwaber and Jeff Sutherland developed Scrum; the Scrum Guide is 
written and provided by them. Together, they stand behind the Scrum Guide.
posts.caption: scrum.org
posts.description: What is Scrum? Scrum.org explains the Scrum basics, how Scrum is used, and how it works. Gain a very basic understanding of Scrum here!
